title: HTML Metadata & SEO Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML metadata and search engine optimization

questions.question: Where does metadata go in an HTML document?

questions.explanation: charset="UTF-8" ensures all characters are correctly displayed.

questions.question: What's the main purpose of <meta name="description">?
choices: Summarizes the page for search engines
questions.explanation: It provides the snippet you often see in search engine results.

questions.question: Does <meta name="keywords"> still boost SEO today?
choices: No, most search engines ignore it
Only if you have exactly 5 keywords
questions.explanation: Google and others ignore it because people abused it.

questions.question: Why is <meta name="viewport"> important?
choices: It makes your site load faster
It controls how the site scales on mobile
questions.explanation: Without it, mobile pages look zoomed-out and tiny.
